item.title: Endangered Plants
item.description: Today we are analyzing extinct and endangered plants for TidyTuesday. Every week I find myself starting my research path at the truly excellent site Data-to-Viz by Yan Holtz and Conor Healy for inspiration on what I want to try and learn with R. The site is interactive and helps you figure out the best visualization given numerical or categorical data. It’s well worth a bookmark in your favorite browser.

item.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
item.description: Today we are looking at text data from the scripts for the TV show ‘Avatar: The Last Airbender’. I decided to see if certain characters that dominate a show, based on their word count, affects the ratings in a postive or negative way. It would be interesting to incorporate screen time as well, but all I have here is word count. Setup First we setup our enivronment and load the dataset.

item.title: Coffee Ratings
item.description: A TidyTuesday project modelling coffee ratings predictions
